title: Notecard Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: JSON description of the card.temp API

apiVersion.description: Semantic version of the Notecard API

minutes.description: If specified, creates a templated _temp.qo file that gathers Notecard temperature value at the specified minutes interval

status.description: Overrides minutes with a voltage-variable value

stop.description: If set to true, the Notecard will stop logging the temperature value at the interval specified with the minutes parameter

sync.description: If set to true, the Notecard will immediately sync any pending _temp.qo Notes created with the minutes parameter
